name: Monkeying Around (isacben)
description:
Instructions

It is lunch time in the construction site. Your boss is giving you a mission: "Find all the lunch boxes for your colleagues".

When you are done, meet your boss again.

Controls

  • Left key: move left
  • Right key: move right

Credits

  • Game design & programming: Isaac Benitez
  • Music composer: Isaac Benitez
  • Pixel art: Isaac Benitez

Monkeying Around is my submission for the GitHub Game Off 2022 game jam.

All assets (pixel art, FXs and music) were created from scratch during Game Off 2022.

GitHub repository: https://github.com/isacben/monkeying-around
